channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Avro Java SDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Avro Java SDK

item.title: CVE-2024-47561|2024-10-21T08:51:22.972Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20avro%20java%20sdk
item.description: Schema parsing in the Java SDK of Apache Avro 1.11.3 and previous versions allows bad actors to execute arbitrary code. Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.11.4 or 1.12.0, which fix this issue.
